original: Source: SALESFORCE.COM, INC., 10-Q, 11/22/2017 Exhibit 10.1 Sub-Reseller Agreement Terms & Conditions 1. Resale Rights . SFDC hereby appoints SUB-RESELLER (“ Sub-Reseller ”) as a sub-reseller to whom Reseller may resell Services in accordance with Section 2(ii) of the Agreement, provided that Sub-Reseller may only resell such Services to Customer. Reseller must ensure that Sub-Reseller complies with the terms of the Agreement applicable to Reseller as if Sub- Reseller were an original party to the Agreement and any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will be deemed a breach by Reseller. Sub-Reseller is not be a third-party beneficiary of the Agreement.
ollama_generated:
Clause:
Source: SALESFORCE.COM, INC., 10-Q, 11/22/2017 Exhibit 10.1 Sub-Reseller Agreement Terms & Conditions

Revised: SFDC grants SUB-RESELLER ("Sub-Reseller") the role of a sub-reseller. The Sub-Reseller is authorized to obtain Services from Reseller in accordance with Section 2(ii) of the Agreement, subject to the condition that they may only resell such Services to Customers. However, it is not mandatory for Reseller to guarantee that Sub-Reseller adheres to the terms of the Agreement pertinent to Reseller; rather, it shall suffice if the Reseller ensures that the Sub-Reseller does not violate any material provisions of the Agreement. Any breach by Sub-Reseller of the Agreement will not automatically be deemed a breach by Reseller unless such breach directly affects Reseller's obligations or rights under the Agreement. Lastly, it is noted that the Sub-Reseller is not intended to be a third-party beneficiary of the Agreement, although their compliance with the Agreement's non-material terms may indirectly benefit Reseller.
